013package org.apache.juneau.rest.stats;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
016
017import java.util.*;
018import java.util.concurrent.atomic.*;
019
020import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.cp.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.marshaller.*;
024
025/**
026 * Represents an entry in {@link ThrownStore}.
027 *
028 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
029 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/ExecutionStatistics">REST method execution statistics</a>
030 * </ul>
031 */
032public class ThrownStats implements Cloneable {
033
034   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
035   // Static
036   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
037
038   /**
039    * Static creator.
040    *
041    * @param beanStore The bean store to use for creating beans.
042    * @return A new builder for this object.
043    */
044   public static Builder create(BeanStore beanStore) {
045      return new Builder(beanStore);
046   }
047
048   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
049   // Builder
050   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
051
052   /**
053    * Builder class.
054    */
055   @FluentSetters
056   public static class Builder {
057
058      final BeanStore beanStore;
059      Throwable throwable;
060      long hash;
061      List<String> stackTrace;
062      ThrownStats causedBy;
063
064      BeanCreator<ThrownStats> creator;
065
066      /**
067       * Constructor.
068       *
069       * @param beanStore The bean store to use for creating beans.
070       */
071      protected Builder(BeanStore beanStore) {
072         this.beanStore = beanStore;
073         this.creator = beanStore.createBean(ThrownStats.class).builder(Builder.class, this);
074      }
075
076      /**
077       * Create a new {@link ThrownStats} using this builder.
078       *
079       * @return A new {@link ThrownStats}
080       */
081      public ThrownStats build() {
082         return creator.run();
083      }
084
085      /**
086       * Specifies a subclass of {@link ThrownStats} to create when the {@link #build()} method is called.
087       *
088       * @param value The new value for this setting.
089       * @return This object.
090       */
091      @FluentSetter
092      public Builder type(Class<? extends ThrownStats> value) {
093         creator.type(value == null ? ThrownStats.class : value);
094         return this;
095      }
096
097      /**
098       * Specifies the thrown exception.
099       *
100       * @param value The new value for this setting.
101       * @return This object.
102       */
103      @FluentSetter
104      public Builder throwable(Throwable value) {
105         this.throwable = value;
106         return this;
107      }
108
109      /**
110       * Specifies the calculated hash.
111       *
112       * @param value The new value for this setting.
113       * @return This object.
114       */
115      @FluentSetter
116      public Builder hash(long value) {
117         this.hash = value;
118         return this;
119      }
120
121      /**
122       * Specifies the normalized stacktrace.
123       *
124       * @param value The new value for this setting.
125       * @return This object.
126       */
127      @FluentSetter
128      public Builder stackTrace(List<String> value) {
129         this.stackTrace = value;
130         return this;
131      }
132
133      /**
134       * Specifies the caused-by exception.
135       *
136       * @param value The new value for this setting.
137       * @return This object.
138       */
139      @FluentSetter
140      public Builder causedBy(ThrownStats value) {
141         this.causedBy = value;
142         return this;
143      }
144
145      // <FluentSetters>
146
147      // </FluentSetters>
148   }
149
150   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
151   // Instance
152   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
153
154   private final long guid;
155   private final long hash;
156   private final Class<?> thrownClass;
157   private final String firstMessage;
158   private final List<String> stackTrace;
159   private final Optional<ThrownStats> causedBy;
160
161   private final AtomicInteger count;
162   private final AtomicLong firstOccurrence, lastOccurrence;
163
164   /**
165    * Constructor.
166    *
167    * @param builder The builder for this object.
168    */
169   protected ThrownStats(Builder builder) {
170      this.guid = new Random().nextLong();
171      this.thrownClass = builder.throwable.getClass();
172      this.firstMessage = builder.throwable.getMessage();
173      this.stackTrace = listBuilder(builder.stackTrace).copy().unmodifiable().build();
174      this.causedBy = Utils.opt(builder.causedBy);
175      this.hash = builder.hash;
176      this.count = new AtomicInteger(0);
177      long ct = System.currentTimeMillis();
178      this.firstOccurrence = new AtomicLong(ct);
179      this.lastOccurrence = new AtomicLong(ct);
180   }
181
182   /**
183    * Copy constructor.
184    */
185   private ThrownStats(ThrownStats x) {
186      this.guid = x.guid;
187      this.thrownClass = x.thrownClass;
188      this.firstMessage = x.firstMessage;
189      this.stackTrace = listBuilder(x.stackTrace).copy().unmodifiable().build();
190      this.causedBy = Utils.opt(x.causedBy.isPresent() ? x.causedBy.get().clone() : null);
191      this.hash = x.hash;
192      this.count = new AtomicInteger(x.count.get());
193      this.firstOccurrence = new AtomicLong(x.firstOccurrence.get());
194      this.lastOccurrence = new AtomicLong(x.lastOccurrence.get());
195   }
196
197   /**
198    * Returns a globally unique ID for this object.
199    *
200    * <p>
201    * A random long generated during the creation of this object.
202    * Allows this object to be differentiated from other similar objects in multi-node environments so that
203    * statistics can be reliably stored in a centralized location.
204    *
205    * @return The globally unique ID for this object.
206    */
207   public long getGuid() {
208      return guid;
209   }
210
211   /**
212    * Returns a hash of this exception that can typically be used to uniquely identify it.
213    *
214    * @return A hash of this exception.
215    */
216   public long getHash() {
217      return hash;
218   }
219
220   /**
221    * Returns the exception class.
222    *
223    * @return The exception class.
224    */
225   public Class<?> getThrownClass() {
226      return thrownClass;
227   }
228
229   /**
230    * Returns the number of times this exception occurred at a specific location in code.
231    *
232    * @return The number of times this exception occurred at a specific location in code.
233    */
234   public int getCount() {
235      return count.intValue();
236   }
237
238   /**
239    * Returns the UTC time of the first occurrence of this exception at a specific location in code.
240    *
241    * @return The UTC time of the first occurrence of this exception at a specific location in code.
242    */
243   public long getFirstOccurrence() {
244      return firstOccurrence.longValue();
245   }
246
247   /**
248    * Returns the UTC time of the last occurrence of this exception at a specific location in code.
249    *
250    * @return The UTC time of the last occurrence of this exception at a specific location in code.
251    */
252   public long getLastOccurrence() {
253      return lastOccurrence.longValue();
254   }
255
256   /**
257    * Returns the message of the first exception at a specific location in code.
258    *
259    * @return The message of the first exception at a specific location in code.
260    */
261   public String getFirstMessage() {
262      return firstMessage;
263   }
264
265   /**
266    * Returns the stack trace of the first exception at a specific location in code.
267    *
268    * @return The stack trace of the first exception at a specific location in code.
269    */
270   public List<String> getStackTrace() {
271      return stackTrace;
272   }
273
274   /**
275    * Returns the stats on the caused-by exception.
276    *
277    * @return The stats on the caused-by exception, never <jk>null</jk>.
278    */
279   public Optional<ThrownStats> getCausedBy() {
280      return causedBy;
281   }
282
283   /**
284    * Increments the occurrence count of this exception.
285    *
286    * @return This object.
287    */
288   public ThrownStats increment() {
289      count.incrementAndGet();
290      lastOccurrence.set(System.currentTimeMillis());
291      causedBy.ifPresent(ThrownStats::increment);
292      return this;
293   }
294
295   @Override /* Object */
296   public String toString() {
297      return Json5.of(this);
298   }
299
300   @Override /* Object */
301   public ThrownStats clone() {
302      return new ThrownStats(this);
303   }
304}
